tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE facial_recognition_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    image_url STRING,
    detected_faces INT,
    face_identification_result JSON
)

CREATE TABLE facial_recognition_users (
    user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    face_encoding BYTEA
);
